availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Breathitt County, Kentucky, farmer. Perry County, Kentucky, native. Married to Sarah "Sally" Gwin Deaton. Father of Malinda Deaton, William Deaton, Nancy Deaton, Thomas Deaton, Elizabeth Deaton, Charlotte Deaton, James Deaton, John Deaton, Drewey Deaton, and Ambrose Deaton. Farmer in Breathitt County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Breathitt County in 1860. Farmer in Breathitt County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breathitt County, District 1, p. 42B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breathitt County, District 1, pp. 332-3.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breathitt County, Precinct 2, pp. 405A-B.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Breathitt County, KY, July and December 1863, p. 42.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994029, Breathitt County Births.
